monster Vaction

{{ vacation.title }} in {{ vacation.destination }}

From {{ vacation.date_start.slice(0, vacation.date_start.length - 14) }} To {{ vacation.date_end.slice(0, vacation.date_end.length - 14) }}

{{ vacation.description }}

Just $ {{ vacation.price }}

Del

// import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; // import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; // import { createContext } from 'rxjs'; // import { About } from './TopNavbar/About'; // import { NewVacationForm } from './Forms/NewVacationForm'; // import { NewVacationUpdateForm } from './Forms/NewVacationUpdateForm'; // import { VacationDeleteForm } from './Forms/VacationDeleteForm'; // import { LoginModal } from './Forms/LoginModal'; // import { RegisterModal } from './Forms/RegisterModal'; // @Component({ // selector: 'app-root', // templateUrl: './app.component.html', // styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] // }) // export class AppComponent implements OnInit { // modeUser = false; // isLogin = false; // items = [{}]; // openNewVacationModal = false; // openNewVacationUpdateModal = false; // updateData = ''; // openDeleteVacationModal = false; // openAboutModal = false; // deleteIdFromData = ''; // openLoginModal = !this.isLogin; // openRegisterModal = false; // modeAdmin = false; // nameOfUser = 'Guest'; // constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} // ngOnInit() { // this.getVacations(); // } // getVacations() { // this.http // .get('https://react-node-mysql-jwt.herokuapp.com/vacations') // .subscribe( // (response) => { // this.items = response; // }, // (error) => { // console.log(error); // } // ); // } // } import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vacations', templateUrl: './vacations.component.html', styleUrls: ['./vacations.component.css'] }) export class VacationsComponent implements OnInit { vacations: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.http.get('https://react-node-mysql-jwt.herokuapp.com/vacations') .subscribe(data => { this.vacations = data; }); } }
